title: Examining The Supply Chain, Labor, And Alternative Energy
itunes:title: Examining The Supply Chain, Labor, And Alternative Energy
description:
Lisa Chai, Senior Analyst at ROBO Global, discusses supply chain issues, holiday shopping, and how warehouses are keeping up. Tom Gimbel, founder & CEO of the staffing and recruiting firm, LaSalle Network, talks about labor and the economy. Jennifer Bartashus, Senior Analyst of Packaged Food & Retail Staples with Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses Wal-Mart earnings and consumer demand ahead of the holidays. Seth Grae, CEO of Lightbridge Corporation, breaks down the energy sector, gas prices, and alternative energy. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
